cast.name: 达芬妮·鲁宾-维佳 Daphne Rubin-Vega
索科萝·圣地亚哥 Socorro Santiago
伊丽莎白·莫斯 Elisabeth Moss

writer.name: 戴宝拉·卡姆普梅尔 Deborah Kampmeier

director.name: 戴宝拉·卡姆普梅尔 Deborah Kampmeier

introduction: Teenaged Jessie isn't like the rest of her highly religious family. While her sister is devoted to long distance running and her parents to their conservative Baptist church, Jessie is a bit too eager, a little bit adrift as she drives the dark night streets delivering newspapers. When Jessie finds herself pregnant without any memory of sex and determines that she is carrying the child of God, she disrupts the accepted roles and unquestioned order within her family and her entire small town. Rich with strange apparitions and mysterious women, but also with heartbreakingly simple human interactions, Deborah Kampmeier's magical and profound first feature explores the meaning of love, family, divinity, and the imagination.高中生杰西是保守宗教家庭的异类，妹妹酷爱长跑，父母经常前往浸礼会。而她生命的意义就只剩香烟，Jack Daniels和她迷恋的还不知道姓名男孩Shane。舞会的那晚，Shane带着杰西来到树林，并用毒品喝酒精将杰西灌的失去知觉，强奸了她。杰西醒来后并没有被袭的记忆，当她发现她怀孕后，她相信这一切是纯洁的，是上帝的孩子，不过她将忍受第二次来袭——她的想法不仅激怒了家人，甚至是整个小镇。
